titles.title: Curious George
titles.description: Little ones can learn a lot from George -- one of the most curious monkeys in all of literature -- with adventures narrated by William H. Macy.

titles.title: House, M.D.
titles.description: Hugh Laurie stars as the ornery Dr. Gregory House, a paradoxical physician who loathes his patients but is a genius at treating mysterious ailments.

titles.title: Blitz
titles.description: With a serial killer on the loose in London, a detective takes on the case while working out his aggression issues with a police-appointed shrink.

titles.title: The Reunion
titles.description: Despite their animus for one another, three brothers -- a suspended cop, a bail bondsman and a thief just out of jail -- unite to pursue a kidnapper.

titles.title: Machine Gun Preacher
titles.description: Gerard Butler stars in this true-life story of Sam Childers, a former drug dealer who dedicates his life to rescuing child soldiers in the Sudan.

titles.title: Special Forces
titles.description: While covering the war in Afghanistan, journalist Elsa is kidnapped by the Taliban, and a Special Forces team races against time to rescue her.

titles.title: The Eagle
titles.description: Haunted by the disappearance of his father, centurion Marcus Aquila sets out to unravel the mystery and recover the legion's eagle standard.

titles.title: Johnny English Reborn
titles.description: Bumbling spy Johnny English sharpens his skills at a Tibetan monastery and returns to service to protect the Chinese premier from an assassin.

titles.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: The Sacred Star of Milos
titles.description: In this sequel to Fullmetal Alchemist, the Elric brothers travel to the land of Milos, where people are rebelling against their masters.

titles.title: Spy Kids: All the Time in the World
titles.description: Former Spy Kids Carmen and Juni return to help twin siblings Rebecca and Cecil Wilson save the world with their retired secret-agent stepmother.

titles.title: A 2nd Chance
titles.description: A gymnast lacks the confidence she needs to reach the top. But with the help of her new coach, she has the chance to win a spot on the national team.

titles.title: Blue Mountain State
titles.description: Follow the misadventures of three freshmen -- quarterback Alex, running back Craig and mascot Sammy -- at gridiron powerhouse Blue Mountain State.

titles.title: Blue Exorcist
titles.description: Determined to throw off the curse of being Satan's illegitimate son, Rin enters the True Cross Academy to become an exorcist, just like his mentor.

titles.title: One Tree Hill
titles.description: In this series, half-brothers Lucas and Nathan alternate between kinship and rivalry on the basketball court and in the hearts of their friends.

titles.title: Chuck
titles.description: When underachieving computer geek Chuck Bartowski accidentally downloads a classified data app into his brain, he suddenly becomes a government asset.

titles.title: Mysteries at the Museum Collection
titles.description: History buff Don Wildman explores archives and museums across the country to uncover objects and artifacts that reveal the nation's hidden secrets.

titles.title: Beast Hunter
titles.description: Biologist Pat Spain travels the world to investigate reports of cryptid sightings, including a dinosaur-like creature in the Congo.

titles.title: Cyberbully
titles.description: Teenager Taylor Hillridge finds herself a target of bullying by fellow students through a popular social website in this topical drama with a message.

titles.title: Lemonade Mouth
titles.description: Five high school students meet in detention and form a band that not only rocks their school but becomes a force for good in this Disney musical.

titles.title: Teen Spirit
titles.description: When an accident ends Amber Pollock's life, she is given a task that could save her soul: Get the school's least popular girl to be voted Prom Queen.

titles.title: Snow on Tha Bluff
titles.description: Set in urban Atlanta, this hyperreal gangster drama centers on kinetic dope dealer Curtis Snow, who records his daily adventures.

titles.title: Monster High: Fright On!
titles.description: Big changes are afoot at Monster High when administrators announce a merger with two other schools, designed to bring all monsters together.

titles.title: Phineas and Ferb the Movie: Across the 2nd Dimension
titles.description: After following Dr. Doofenshmirtz into an alternate universe, Phineas and Ferb make a discovery about their pet platypus, Perry: He's a secret agent.

titles.title: The Gruffalo's Child
titles.description: Ignoring her father's warnings about the fearsome "Big Bad Mouse," the Gruffalo's child and ventures into the forest to find the fabled beast.

titles.title: Geek Charming
titles.description: Popular high school diva Dylan gains a new perspective on life when geeky wannabe filmmaker Josh makes her the subject of his documentary.

titles.title: Forensic Files
titles.description: Detectives and crime lab technicians use the latest and most fascinating procedures to solve crimes in this documentary-style show.

titles.title: Forgotten Planet: Abandoned America
titles.description: Areas once teeming with activity have transformed into eerie ghost towns. Explore how these places became deserted, desolate reminders of the past.

titles.title: Russia's Toughest Prisons
titles.description: Three Russian prisons unlock their doors to an international film crew and reveal what life inside is like for the nation's most brutal criminals.

titles.title: TED Talks: Life Hack
titles.description: This TEDTalks collection reveals simple tricks that can transform your life. Learn how to start a movement, the secret to better work and much more.

titles.title: Good Luck Charlie: It's Christmas
titles.description: It's a holiday adventure the Duncans won't soon forget as Teddy and Amy get separated from the family upon their flight to Palm Springs.

titles.title: Division III: Football's Finest
titles.description: When the Blue Cocks coach drops dead on the sidelines, redneck psycho Rick Vice is brought in to turn around the worst team in college football.

titles.title: A Few Best Men
titles.description: A would-be groom sees his wedding day turn into a fiasco when his terminally pubescent best friends, a drug dealer and a male sheep enter the picture.

titles.title: Flypaper
titles.description: Two gangs unwittingly attempt to rob a bank at the same time, catching innocent Tripp and Kaitlin in the middle of the action.

titles.title: The Snitch Cartel
titles.description: Struggling to rise above his working-class origins, Martin Gonzalez begins selling drugs for the brutal North Valley Cartel.

titles.title: Our Idiot Brother
titles.description: A seemingly clueless idealist relies on his exasperated sisters for shelter and support after his girlfriend dumps him and his dog is taken away.

titles.title: Remembrance
titles.description: A married woman faces an emotional crisis when she learns that the former lover who rescued her from a concentration camp 30 years earlier is alive.

titles.title: The Pill
titles.description: After a one-night stand, uptight Fred spends an adventure-filled day with offbeat Mindy to ensure she takes both doses of the morning-after pill.

titles.title: Bernie
titles.description: An affable mortician befriends his small town's wealthiest widow, but it's not long before he gets fed up with her neediness and sour attitude.

titles.title: Terra Nova
titles.description: The Shannon family travels with other settlers from the scorched Earth of the 22nd century to establish a colony in the prehistoric past.

titles.title: Rescue Me
titles.description: Haunted by his past, a veteran New York City firefighter struggles to handle his high-stress job and the emotional turmoil of his personal life.

titles.title: Torchwood
titles.description: This "Doctor Who" spinoff follows the fight against hostile aliens by the Torchwood Institute team, with the enigmatic Capt. Jack Harkness in command.

titles.title: Apollo 18
titles.description: This sci-fi thriller suggests that Apollo 17, despite official statements to the contrary, wasn't NASA's last manned mission to the moon.

titles.title: Kitchen Nightmares (U.S.)
titles.description: Chef Gordon Ramsay visits failing restaurants, pinpoints their problems and whips the errant cooks, waitstaff and owners into shape.

titles.title: To Catch a Smuggler
titles.description: Homeland Security officers at New York's JFK International Airport deal with drug smuggling, human trafficking and more in this documentary series.

titles.title: Ghost Adventures Collection
titles.description: An intrepid team of paranormal investigators sets out to research and experience the most terrifying haunted places in the world.

titles.title: Auction Hunters
titles.description: Allen Haff and Ton Jones bid on abandoned storage units, uncovering the hidden gems of America's past and turning a serious profit.

titles.title: Holmes Inspection Collection
titles.description: Victimized by poor home assessments, homeowners turn to general contractor Mike Holmes for a proper inspection and to make their homes shipshape.

titles.title: Off Limits Collection
titles.description: Explorer and history buff Don Wildman ventures to the forbidden and hidden spaces of America to unearth truths of our past and secrets to our future.

titles.title: The First 48: Collection
titles.description: The first 48 hours of a homicide investigation are the most important, as detectives gather forensic evidence and seek interviews to solve a case.

titles.title: Paranormal Home Inspectors
titles.description: A home inspector and a psychic team up to investigate unusual occurrences to determine if they can be explained rationally or are paranormal.

titles.title: Freezing
titles.description: In a future world at war with aliens, a promising young military student and his genetically altered classmate team up as a powerful fighting force.

titles.title: Deadman Wonderland
titles.description: Falsely convicted for the mass murder of his classmates, a schoolboy must endure a nightmarish penal system, all while trying to prove his innocence.

titles.title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica
titles.description: One day, Madoka Kaname has a very magical encounter, one that can change her destiny. This is the beginning of the new story of magical witch girls.

titles.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan: Demon Capital
titles.description: By night, teenage Rikuo becomes a form of demon called yokai, preparing to fulfill his destiny as the head of his legendary yokai clan.

titles.title: Mazinkaiser SKL
titles.description: A mechanized robotic weapon has been sent into the barren wasteland of a colossal floating island, where once-dormant deadly forces have reawakened.

titles.title: Goon
titles.description: When he's seen dispatching a rude opposing hockey player in the stands, Doug Glatt is hired by a rival team ... for his fighting skills.

titles.title: Undefeated
titles.description: An inspirational profile of an inner-city high school football team's valiant effort to reach the school's first-ever playoff game.

titles.title: All Things Fall Apart
titles.description: A gifted college running back's world turns upside down when a crisis jeopardizes his professional ambitions -- and teaches him some life lessons.

titles.title: The Art of Flight
titles.description: Curt Morgan follows iconic snowboarder Travis Rice to far-flung locales in search of the perfect environment to try out outrageous new tricks.

titles.title: Chalet Girl
titles.description: Ex-skateboarder Kim Matthews is transplanted to the world of alpine sports, an environment she finds foreign ... until she tries snowboarding.

titles.title: Knockout
titles.description: Now a school janitor, weary former pro boxer Dan Barnes tries to help a new student stand up to the bullies who are tormenting him.

titles.title: A Warrior's Heart
titles.description: After his father dies in combat, teenage Conor gets into serious trouble but is challenged to get his life back on track in an intense lacrosse camp.

titles.title: A Mile in His Shoes
titles.description: A minor-league baseball team finds renewed inspiration when they hire new pitcher Mickey Tussler, a lad who suffers from Asperger's syndrome.

titles.title: You're Next
titles.description: A shy girl goes to her new boyfriend's family reunion and must join their bloody fight for survival when a gang of masked hooligans invades the party.

titles.title: The Ouija Experiment
titles.description: Film student Brandon and four friends play with a ouija board, unwittingly opening a portal to the spirit world and a drowned girl's deadly mystery.

titles.title: The Awakening
titles.description: A haunted boarding school calls on Florence Cathcart, who disproves hoaxes for a living. But the strange place leads Cathcart to question rationality.

titles.title: El Escape de Hitler
titles.description: This program examines new questions and doubts raised by recent DNA and ballistic evidence about Adolf Hitler's death and final resting place.

titles.title: 12 Dates of Christmas
titles.description: Set up on a blind date with handsome Miles on Christmas Eve, Kate gets 12 chances to relive the date over and over again until she sets things right.

titles.title: A Christmas Kiss
titles.description: An aspiring designer is mortified to learn that the mysterious man she kissed in a falling elevator is her callous boss's boyfriend.

titles.title: Getting That Girl
titles.description: When East Coast teen Mandy Meyers moves to Los Angeles with her family, she's thrown into the fast life at McDermott High, where the pretty girls rule the school and two very different guys want to date her.

titles.title: 35 and Ticking
titles.description: Four friends struggle to reconcile reality with the hopes and dreams they have about starting families and finding happiness with someone they love.

titles.title: A Little Bit of Heaven
titles.description: After learning that she has terminal cancer, a spirited young woman thinks she's finished with love forever -- but her heart has other ideas.

titles.title: Jane Eyre
titles.description: Driven from her post at Thornfield House, young governess Jane Eyre reflects on her youth and the events that led her to misty moors.

titles.title: Eva
titles.description: Programmer Alex, recently hired to develop a robot child, is inspired by his pretty niece Eva, whose mother, his former lover, awakens old feelings.

titles.title: Autumn Blood
titles.description: After an adolescent girl and her young brother are orphaned in a rural mountain town, the innocent pair become vulnerable to a brutal attack.

titles.title: State of Emergency
titles.description: After an explosion unleashes the contents of a biological weapons plant, the locals are transformed into an army of flesh-eating zombies.

titles.title: The Ward
titles.description: In this chilling thriller from director John Carpenter, a young woman is sent to a mental institution with a past as dark and haunted as her own.

titles.title: Vile
titles.description: Ten kidnapped captives have 24 hours to mount an escape from a locked room, but they must endure excruciating pain in order to win their freedom.

titles.title: The Hunter
titles.description: Willem Dafoe stars as a mercenary sent to Tasmania to track down the last living Tasmanian tiger and obtain its genetic material.

titles.title: Beginners
titles.description: This absorbing drama follows a graphic artist as he comes to grips with the imminent death of his father, who, at 75, has one last secret: He's gay.

titles.title: Kiss Me
titles.description: When Mia attends her estranged father's engagement party and meets her soon-to-be stepsister, sparks fly and Mia unexpectedly falls in love.

titles.title: Our Paradise
titles.description: When an aging male prostitute in Paris rescues an unconscious young drifter in a park, the two men become lovers and accomplices in robbery.

titles.title: North Sea Texas
titles.description: A teen boy living in a small town on the Belgian coast finds his ordinary life take an unexpected turn when a handsome traveler blows through town.

titles.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu: Way of the Ninja
titles.description: Kai grew up dreaming of becoming a blacksmith like his father. But that was before skeleton warriors ransacked his village and abducted his sister.

titles.title: Ironclad
titles.description: A moral Knight Templar and his "Magnificent Seven" defend Rochester Castle from ruthless King John and his armies, who seek to rule England by force.

titles.title: Dream House
titles.description: Abandoning high-stress Manhattan, Will moves to a quiet New England town but learns that his new home was the site of several brutal murders.

titles.title: Gun Hill
titles.description: A pair of twins take opposing paths -- one is a cop and the other a con man -- until the night one is killed and his brother assumes his identity.
